problem: 如图,已知AB是⊙O的直径,BC是弦,∠ABC=28°,过圆心O作OD⊥BC交弧BC于点D,连接DC,则∠DCB的度数是()
comment: 此题考查了垂直的定义与圆周角定理．此题比较简单,注意数形结合思想的应用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, BC is the chord, ∠ABC = N_0, passing the center O to make OD ⊥ BC intersects BC at point D, connects DC, then the degree of ∠DCB is ()
